"What is (are) Parasites - Lice - Pubic ""Crab"" Lice ?","Also called crab lice or ""crabs,"" pubic lice are parasitic insects found primarily in the pubic or genital area of humans. Pubic lice infestation is found worldwide and occurs in all races, ethnic
